title: 【红石整理】本人红石索引贴
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2674609686 于 2015-2-21 20:25 编辑 

大家好，这次我把本人以往的红石作品整理了，发布了这个索引贴：
[diamond_gem]无敌密码门，解密或服务器必备[diamond_gem]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-370319-1-1.html

[gold_ingot]半自动养鸡场，农民必备[gold_ingot]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=413169&page=1#pid7703746

[iron_ingot]TNT大炮，熊孩子毁服必备[iron_ingot]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=413135&page=1#pid7703862

[clay_ingot]小型红石游戏公园，此贴可能比较渣，请谅解[clay_ingot]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=272490&page=1#pid5243191

[coal]一个3位按钮密码门，防御性差一点[coal]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=270964&page=1#pid5221094

[flint]半自动农场[flint]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=225086&page=1#pid4329283

[redstone_dust]一个红石机器集合[redstone_dust]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=228728&page=1#pid4438364

[gunpowder]隐藏楼梯[gunpowder]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=227194&page=1#pid4371758 

[glowstone_dust]唱片机红石电动门[glowstone_dust]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=224373&page=1#pid4316036

[slimeball]解密地图1个[slimeball]
 
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=229449&page=1#pid4439077 

回复是中华民族的传统美德，拒绝伸手党！
觉得好就给人气和金粒{:10_492:}

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: 居然还有前几个小时连发的...感觉这样不太好，一天发一贴就行了

replies.author: 白安西
replies.txt_content: 不懂红石 但是看起来很厉害的样子QW

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content: 楼主可以去申请勋章了。

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 为什么不直接把文字做成可以点的
